en: Put that whip away! I'm an engineer, my fighting days are long gone. My name is Baz.
You must be trying to get to the ship wreck down the road, could be lots of parts to fix your bike. You could do us both a favour and get rid of all these mutant monsters so I can fix the bridge
They won't bother a large fellow like myself if I leave them be, but if I go into that swarm I'm sure there'll be trouble
